Flying
Whenever Griv enters or attacks, discard a card, then draw a card. When you do, Griv deals damage to up to one target creature equal to the discarded card’s mana value.
[i]Channel[/i] – {1}{R}, Discard Griv: Discard a card, then draw two cards.
[i]Channel[/i] – {3}{R}, Discard Griv: Griv deals 6 damage to target creature.
